QuestData.Title: Loola's Lost Love
QuestData.Description: Oh it was horrible.$b$bMy husband and I were fishing in the marsh, I fell asleep and when I woke up he had been turned into a toad!$b$bI'm sure it was one of those Shadowmoon orcs I hear so much about.$b$bHe jumped into the muddy waters before I could catch him.$b$bWill you help me find my lost love, $c?
QuestData.LogDescription: Search Loose Mud for Old Loola's husband.
QuestData.CompletionText: Knowing my husband he's probably hibernating. Did you check the loose mud in the marsh?
QuestData.RewardText: Hmm... I'm sure one of these toads is my husband.
